description: A musher on a sled is being pulled by a team of husky-like dogs across a snowy landscape. One of the dogs is depicted as having gone 'flat,' appearing deflated and limp on the ground. This creates an absurd situation where an organic creature behaves like an inanimate object with a puncture. The musher's surprised exclamation highlights the inconvenience of this surreal event in the harsh environment. The other dogs appear concerned or annoyed by the predicament.
caption: "Egad! ... Another flat!"
